<title level="1" pfs="">[Rival Corpsekiller](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2428)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 37

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 16">[Rival Corpsekiller](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2428)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #186: Ghost King's Rage](/Sources.aspx?ID=189) pg. 30

**Perception** +28

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +28, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +32, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +26, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +26, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +26, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +28, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +26, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +28

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +4

**Con** +5

**Int** +3

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +3
</row>

**Items**
_+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [glaive](/Weapons.aspx?ID=20)_, _+2 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 39 

**Fort** +30 

**Ref** +28 

**Will** +25 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 370
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

</row>

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" /> 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet (20 feet with armor)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_glaive_ +32 ([deadly d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d8+15 slashing plus corpsekiller

**Circling Assault** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Open](/Traits.aspx?ID=123)) The corpsekiller circles around their target then attacks, throwing their foe off balance and puncturing its defenses. The corpsekiller Steps or Strides, then attempts a glaive Strike. On a hit or critical hit, the Strike ignores 10 of their target's resistances. Regardless of the result of the Strike, the target is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) for 1 round.

**Corpsekiller**   A corpsekiller's Strikes affect [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) creatures as though etched with a _[ghost touch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297)_ property rune and deal an additional 2d8 slashing damage to [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) creatures.

</column>
name: Rival Corpsekiller

text: Rival Corpsekiller Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 37 Unspecific Lore : DC 35 Specific Lore : DC 32 Rival Corpsekiller Source Pathfinder #186: Ghost King's Rage pg. 30 Perception +28 Languages Common, Necril Skills Acrobatics +28, Athletics +32, Deception +26, Diplomacy +26, Intimidation +26, Religion +28, Society +26, Stealth +28 Str +5 Dex +4 Con +5 Int +3 Wis +4 Cha +3 Items +2 greater striking glaive , +2 resilient breastplate --- AC 39 Fort +30 Ref +28 Will +25 HP 370 (negative healing) Attack of Opportunity Reaction --- Speed 25 feet (20 feet with armor) Melee Single Action glaive +32 (deadly d8, Forceful, Magical, Reach), Damage 3d8+15 slashing plus corpsekiller Circling Assault Two Actions (Open) The corpsekiller circles around their target then attacks, throwing their foe off balance and puncturing its defenses. The corpsekiller Steps or Strides, then attempts a glaive Strike. On a hit or critical hit, the Strike ignores 10 of their target's resistances. Regardless of the result of the Strike, the target is flat-footed for 1 round. Corpsekiller A corpsekiller's Strikes affect incorporeal creatures as though etched with a ghost touch property rune and deal an additional 2d8 slashing damage to undead creatures.
